alert.note: Alert for Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 8:22PM CST until January 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Sucarnoochee River At Livingston affecting Sumter County. .The Sucarnoochee River is forecast to crest right at flood stage on Sunday morning. A flood warning remains in effect. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sucarnoochee River at Livingston. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Flooding of farm lands around Livingston occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Friday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.0 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
